division.explanation: Write the name of the court division (like 'Honolulu', 'Wai‘anae', etc.) where you're filing the case.

case_number.explanation: Leave this blank. The court will assign a case number after you file.

plaintiff_name.explanation: Write your full name. You are the person filing the case (the tenant).

plaintiff_contact.explanation: Write your full address, phone number, and email so the court can contact you.

landlord_name.explanation: Write the full name of your landlord. They are the Defendant in the case.

landlord_contact.explanation: Write your landlord’s full address, phone number, and email (if known).

amount_owed.explanation: Write the amount of your security deposit that you believe your landlord still owes you.

move_out_date.explanation: Write the date you moved out of the rental property (month/day/year).

reason_for_claim.explanation: Explain why you believe your landlord should return your security deposit. You can attach more pages if needed.

declaration_date.explanation: Write the date you are signing this form.

plaintiff_signature.explanation: Sign your name to swear that everything you wrote is true.

notice_to.explanation: Write your landlord’s name again here for the notice section.

hearing_place.explanation: The court will fill this in with the address of the courthouse where your hearing will be.

hearing_date_time.explanation: The court will fill this in with the date and time for your hearing.

clerk_signature_date.explanation: The court clerk will write the date when the hearing was scheduled.

clerk_signature.explanation: The court clerk will sign here after scheduling your hearing.
